ngiemboon: À syě tà á cʉ́ʼʉ ményaŋ à gwe ssé.
en: He slipped so badly that he almost fell.

ngiemboon: À lɔ̌g nkÿo menzoŋ menzóŋ ńkéle nkáʼ wé.
en: He used barbed wire to fence his field.
me (emphatic subject pronoun, first person singular)

ngiemboon: Eshúm tyéte ndá yé mesǎ mesǎ.
en: Things are arranged haphazardly in his house.

ngiemboon: Áfílíkà áa pàga njÿó meséssé pʉ̀a.
en: Africa is the continent of black people.
